  title: "Define experimental data files format"

</br>

<font color='black'> 
Experimental data file should contain at least: 

i) column with gene IDs, 

ii) column with outcome of statistical test and 

iii) column with measure of response (see <a href="Select_important_columns_and_thresholds_in_your_data_files.html#example file">example file</a>).

</br>

<div class="ui-block-a"><form><input type="checkbox" name="" value=""</form> Click on the box to choose whether your experimental files contain header.</div>
</br>
Click on the button to choose what type of separator/delimiter between columns was used:<br> <!-- comma, tabulator or semicolon. -->
 <form>
  <input type="radio" name="separator" value="comma"> comma<br>
  <input type="radio" name="separator" value="semicolon"> semicolon<br>
  <input type="radio" name="separator" value="tabulator" checked> tabulator
 </form> 
</font>
